org.jenkinsci.plugins.RepositoryPlugin

Class RepositoryPluginDefinition.DescriptorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • hudson.model.Descriptor<hudson.model.ParameterDefinition>
      • hudson.model.ParameterDefinition.ParameterDescriptor
        • org.jenkinsci.plugins.RepositoryPlugin.RepositoryPluginDefinition.DescriptorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hudson.model.Saveable
    Enclosing class:
    RepositoryPluginDefinition

    @Extension
public static class RepositoryPluginDefinition.DescriptorImpl
extends hudson.model.ParameterDefinition.ParameterDescriptor
    Sets a name to identify what the plugin is for. Also, checks if the currently typed repository already exists.

      • doCheckRepoAlias

        public hudson.util.FormValidation doCheckRepoAlias(@QueryParameter
                                          java.lang.String repoAlias)
        Checks if the currently typed repository has already been saved. If it's the case, an error is shown, indicating you should not proceed.
        Parameters:
        repoAlias - The name of the repository.
        Returns:
        A message indicating if a special case is detected. See error message for information.

      • doCheckUrl

        public hudson.util.FormValidation doCheckUrl(@QueryParameter
                                    java.lang.String url)
        Checks if the currently typed repository URL has already been saved.
        If it's the case, an error is shown, indicating you should not proceed.
        Parameters:
        url - The repository URL.
        Returns:
        A message indicating if a special case is detected. See error message for information.
